attributes.action: Street lights on Streethay junction A38
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to get lights on the A38, Streethay junction near Lichfield. I lost my brother on the 21st of February 2012 due to a hit and run incident. If the junction was fully lit his chances would have been greatly increased. This is really important to me as it is a dangerous junction and a busy trade route which unfortunately has taken the life of my dear brother.

With Street lights this junction could be made a much safer one.
